item.title: PNPC All Players?
item.dc:creator: @Dritter Dritter
item.description:
@Dritter wrote:

I have a command in my source right now that affects all players in my radius and makes them bow.
I’d simply like to change that so that anybody within the radius is changed into an NPC, (PNPC command for all).
It was originally a command that just called upon a method.
Original Method Code:

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "OMFG I am worshiping "+playerName+", I thought i would never see him!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }
Any way to modify it for changing all players into the NPC ID of 131?

Read full topic
